title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 151.12 - When canal levels are drawn
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 151.12 - When canal levels are drawn

State Regulations

In the event the Canal Corporation, in its discretion, determines it is necessary to draw down water from any canal level, all floats
which may be upon such level shall be moved to such points as the Canal

Corporation or its representative shall direct. The operator of a float who
fails or refuses to comply with such direction from the Canal Corporation or
its representative shall be subject to a penalty not to exceed
$100. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
151.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
